title: The Other Codex
summary:
Key ideas
- The author had a little bit of money left over after his first year at work and bought a luxurious item
- The item he wanted was the Codex Seraphinianus
- The Codex Seraphinianus is a book that cannot be explained with words

Key learnings
- Sometimes it's good to reward yourself for your hard work
- It's okay to spend money on an item that may seem silly or unnecessary to others as long as it makes you happy

Key questions
- What was the author's reward for a successful year at work?
- What is the Codex Seraphinianus?
- Why did the author feel like buying this item?
